dcterms:creator: Peter Blouw
Xuan Choo
Eric Hunsberger
Chris Eliasmith
dcterms:description: The Aloha dataset is a small collection of audio samples containing the keyword 'Aloha' and several distractors such as 'take a load off'. It consists of approximately 2000 samples, which were augmented using the MUSAN noise dataset.
dcterms:title: Aloha Dataset

dcterms:creator: Alice Coucke
Mohammed Chlieh
Thibault Gisselbrecht
David Leroy
Mathieu Poumeyrol
Thibaut Lavril
dcterms:description: The 'Hey Snips' dataset for wake phrase spotting distinguishes between two classes: the positive class contains 11,000 utterances from over 2,000 speakers of the wake phrase 'Hey Snips', while the negative class contains over 86,000 negative examples from more than 6,000 speakers.
dcterms:title: Hey Snips Dataset

dcterms:creator: Pete Warden
dcterms:description: The Speech Commands dataset contains 35 keywords uttered a total of 105,000 times from over 2,600 speakers. It includes commands such as 'stop', 'go', 'left', 'right', and other words like 'Marvin', 'Sheila', etc., designed for keyword spotting in a limited vocabulary.
dcterms:title: Speech Commands Dataset
